case.title: Handsome, Cute but Kind Man Sought ASAP (35-44) - 38 (West/Central London)
case.text:
I am searching for a handsome, caring and overall decent guy to spend time with, which will hopefully leads to a meaningful relationship! You should be professional and settled with a professional job, sincere, kind and love animals. I really do not mind if you have your own children or are divorced as long as we share a connection. Please be able to spell and speak English!
I am 38, (no dependants or baggage!) in fairly good shape, slim but curvy and work in the city M-F. I'm very independent and own my own flat, I am just looking for somebody nice to share things with. Please reply with a couple of clear photos and maybe we can meet for a coffee! I will send you a photo back by return.
